docs.summary: A hover box is a container that changes when the mouse hovers over it. A hover box has two views: regular and hover. You can attach elements to a hover box. Some actions performed on a hover box affect the elements it contains. For example, [hiding](#hide) a hover box also effectively hides all the elements in the hover box, although the values of the [hidden](#hidden) properties of the elements contained in the hover box do not change.
